SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,AVG(AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,MAX(MAX_SPD) AS MAX_SPD ,MIN_SPD ,B.ROUT_NM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_ROUT_AVER_OPER_SP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
GROUP BY A.REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.REP_ROUT_ID

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,AVG(AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,MAX(MAX_SPD) AS MAX_SPD ,MIN_SPD ,B.ROUT_NM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_ROUT_AVER_OPER_SP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
GROUP BY OPER_DT, A.REP_ROUT_ID
UNION ALL
